shortdesc.ph: Enables/disables stereo sound for remote users.
Enables/disables stereo sound for remote users.
Enables/disables stereo sound for remote users.
Enables/disables stereo sound for remote users.

section.p: To use for spatial audio positioning, make sure to call this method before joining the channel to enable stereo sound for remote users.
To use for spatial audio positioning, make sure to call this method before joining a channel to enable stereo sound for remote users.
To enable spatial audio positioning using , make sure to call this method before joining the channel to enable stereo sound for remote users.
To use to implement spatial audio positioning, make sure to call this method before joining the channel to enable stereo sound for remote users.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable stereo sound for remote users:
: Enable stereo sound.
: Disable stereo sound.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
